name: Work hard, Hero!
description:
※ STORY

How long do we need to hunt monsters?

Let's get some easy money!

All you have to do is make money by hiring welders!

Hunting monsters is the job of hired soldiers.

Please level up to get the welds working hard without any breaks.

If you save a lot of money, buy neighboring castles.

Proper property investment brings you another fortune.

※ game tips

  1. Tap the screen helps you to get gold medals.

  2. If you add more roles, your soldiers would get more gold medals.

  3. If you invest in property, you can continually get more gold medals.

※ DEVELOPER NOTE
